verses.text: \w The|strong="H5612"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w of|strong="H5612"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*. \w The|strong="H5612"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H5612"\w* \w the|strong="H5612"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w of|strong="H5612"\w* \w Nahum|strong="H5151"\w* \w the|strong="H5612"\w* Elkoshite.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7072"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* avengeth; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* avengeth \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* full \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w taketh|strong="H3068"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5358"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w reserveth|strong="H5201"\w* \add wrath \add*\w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* slow \w to|strong="H3068"\w* anger, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w means|strong="H5352"\w* \w clear|strong="H5352"\w* \add the guilty\add*: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w storm|strong="H5492"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dust \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w rebuketh|strong="H1605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* maketh \w it|strong="H3001"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w drieth|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*: \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* languisheth, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flower|strong="H6525"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* languisheth.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w quake|strong="H7493"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \w melt|strong="H4127"\w*; \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w upheaved|strong="H5375"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, yea, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w therein|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*? \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w abide|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w anger|strong="H2534"\w*? \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w poured|strong="H5413"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w like|strong="H2534"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w rocks|strong="H6697"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* \w broken|strong="H5422"\w* asunder \w by|strong="H5975"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strong|strong="H4581"\w* \w hold|strong="H4581"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7291"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w overrunning|strong="H5674"\w* \w flood|strong="H7858"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H4725"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w full|strong="H3617"\w* \w end|strong="H3617"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H4725"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* enemies \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w imagine|strong="H2803"\w* \w against|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w full|strong="H3617"\w* \w end|strong="H3617"\w*: \w affliction|strong="H6869"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* second \w time|strong="H6471"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w tangled|strong="H5440"\w* \w thorns|strong="H5518"\w*, told \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w drenched|strong="H4390"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H4390"\w* \w in|strong="H5518"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w drink|strong="H5435"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* shall \w be|strong="H3588"\w* devoured \w utterly|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w*.

\w There|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w imagineth|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* counselleth \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: Though \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w full|strong="H8003"\w* strength, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w likewise|strong="H3651"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, \w even|strong="H5750"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H1494"\w* \w down|strong="H1494"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w*. Though \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* thee, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* thee \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7665"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* will \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w yoke|strong="H4132"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H7665"\w* will \w burst|strong="H5423"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w sunder|strong="H5423"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H6680"\w* \w commandment|strong="H6680"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H7760"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*: \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* gods \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w image|strong="H6459"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w molten|strong="H4541"\w* \w image|strong="H6459"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w art|strong="H3068"\w* \w vile|strong="H7043"\w*.

Behold, upon the mountains the feet of him that bringeth good tidings, that publisheth peace! Keep thy feasts, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Judah, perform thy vows: for the wicked one shall no more pass through thee; he is utterly cut off.
